featured.text: Type Os are curious and generous but stubborn.
16 , the man answered, “I come from Argos, and there the people are all friendly, generous, and warm-hearted.
Please teach me what you have in your heart that makes you so generous.” 21.

definition.zh_def: 慷慨的，願意給予或分享的。
definition.en_def: Willing to give and share freely; showing a readiness to provide more than is usual or expected.
definition.example: She was very generous with her time, volunteering every weekend.
